comment: Terrible professor, unfortunately the only option for safety. Class project is useless teaches nothing about safety. Suprised that this class qualifies for a safety course. Nothing is taught in class all lectures are prerecorded so be ready to waste time attending mandatory classes where you will learn nothing.

This class was very easy because it was mainly based off of quizzes that he gave us the answers to. As a teacher, it is disrespecful the minimal effort he puts into his class. Paying for this is crazy. He canceled class all of the time and seriously did not lecture one time. Guest speakers every class. I retained nothing from this class.

The whole class is quizzes and guest speakers, with the quizzes being really easy and Godfrey going over the answers at the end of class. You won't really learn much from him about the major, but his guest speakers offer better insight and possible internships which I believe to be more important.

Extremely easy class, he's a nice professor, take him if you just wanna pass. Does cancel class sometimes but he has a medical issue. Many guest speakers. Gives answers to quizzes. Many bonus assignments. Overall he's a great guy.
Professor is horrible please avoid at all costs!

If you want an easy A, take him. But if you want to actually learn, don't. He has many guest speakers and will give you the quiz answers but unless you teach it to yourself you won't know the info. He won't respond to emails and he has no patience for understanding. He is so passive aggressive. Don't recommend really.
Took this course online. Quizzes and exams are all open book from his lectures and links. Big project is time consuming but not very difficult. Tons of opportunities for extra credit.

There are not enough characters to fully describe how professor Godfrey makes me feel. He puts SEVERELY minimal effort into teaching the class. Terrible personality. Unclear grading criteria. Terrible instructions for a project that accounts for 40% of your grade. I don't know how he still has a job teaching. GOOD LUCK!

Simply just try and avoid if possible. Absolutely an awful professor. Good luck getting him to respond to emails if you need any help. A super harsh grader and simply should just be fired. How KSU still lets godfrey teach is beyond me.

Where to even begin with this awful professor. Not even halfway through the semester and he is already the worst professor I have ever had. This man should not even have a job teaching. Gives no time to complete assignments. Does not respond to emails. If you get  a question right he will mark it wrong and you cant argue with him. KSU needs to fire

I will concur with nearly all the other reviews about this professor. He is an extremely difficult grader and terrible communicator. He canceled classes after the first week and lies in his excuses. He is completely unclear about instructions. He is the reason people are not knowledgeable on safety and risk topics following this class.

I don't know how this guy is still employed. He cancels class most of the time but then will randomly make attendance mandatory with 2 quizzes for attendance and will knock points off your grade if you miss them yet he will cancel class with an hour's notice. I watched a couple of videos in class and didn't learn a single thing. do not take

I'm paying to come to a class taught by a lazy professor who frequently cancels, teaches us very little if nothing at all, refuses to amend his frequent grading and attendance errors, cannot post D2L content, conducts himself unprofessionally, and talks down to me at every turn. Avoid him at all costs. Terrible track record; he should be fired!
rating_tags: Tough grader--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: Been in this course for a few weeks and I haven't learned a single thing. All of his lectures have been extremely boring guest speakers who speak about almost irrelevant topics. He doesn't know how to project his voice when he does speak (almost never) and he grades harshly. This is a mandatory class. I hope he is fired and replaced.

You will have to teach yourself. The final project worth about 40% of our grade that he gave no clear direction on. He posted instructions on the format it should be submitted in AFTER the due date, but will not return submissions to those who submitted on time to reformat. He is the only CM professor at KSU that who I have had an issue with.

You will learn Godfreys course on your own. He will either choose to respond to your email a few days later or he won't respond at all. If you are lucky, he will answer the email but doesn't answer your question at all. 2 people complaining to the dean made him get better. He just doesn't seem to care about teaching. He is here for the free money.

The worst professor I've taken throughout my college career. KSU has created a serious problem by making this a mandatory course while Professor Godfrey is the only available teacher. His grading is beyond harsh and he gives no clear instructions for his assignments. He rarely responds to emails and when he does he proceeds to belittle.

Took him for CM 4560 over the summer, one of the worst professors I have had at KSU. Canceled over 75% of the in-person classes and told us to check D2l which just has scanned pages from the text book. Exams are excessively long (100+ questions). Consistently makes multiple assignments and multiple quizzes due every week. Avoid if possible.

Super strict grader. Does not respond quickly to emails. Unclear instructions on final project that is 40% of your grade. Unfortunately, you don't have a choice but to take Godfrey for construction safety because that's all KSU has to offer. good luck.

Cares more about attendance than actually teaching a class. Does not responded to emails. Not great at explaining directions for his own assignments or a final project worth 40% of your grade. Makes a general safety class harder than it needs to be. I highly suggest choosing a different professor.

He canceled class probably for half of the semester. The quizzes/tests are annoying, he is looking for small details and tries to throw you off by changing wording. Everything is based off his ppts and OSHA links. The final project is graded harshly, and takes his time with feedback on them. If you send him emails it takes him days to reply.

We had 13 quizzes which come straight from the PowerPoints, the final project is very confusing and takes forever to give feedback on project milestones. Also graded the final project very harshly, so good luck.

I took Construction Safety with him. Attendance is mandatory, you can go in person or watch the lectures for credit. We had 13 quizzes. I got some of the answers wrong even though they came from the PowerPoints. He grades very harshly. The final project is the worst part. It seems like he's the only one who teaches this class so good luck.
